pyqgis_plugin.about:
The AUTOMATE plugin for QGIS v2 is a comprehensive, modular toolkit for GIS-based gas infrastructure project design according to TENG specifications (Italgas Reti S.p.a.).
🚀 VERSION 2 FEATURES: • Complete modular architecture for enhanced maintainability • Professional code organization with functional separation • Improved performance and reliability
🔧 CORE FUNCTIONALITIES: • RG_COD Management: Manual generation and automated calculation with on/off toggle switch • PhotoEditor Integration: Advanced photo management with Google Street View API and custom editor • Attachment Management: Complete file handling system with trash management • Quality Control: Comprehensive project validation with custom reporting • Project Packaging: Automated zip creation for project submission • Configuration Management: Advanced settings and preferences system
🏗️ MODULAR ARCHITECTURE: • tools/rg_cod/: RG code generation system with automation control • tools/photo/: Photo management and editing capabilities • tools/attachments/: File attachment and deletion system • tools/controller/: Quality assurance and validation tools • tools/settings/: Configuration dialogs and preferences • tools/zip/: Project compression and progress tracking • core/: Shared utilities and configuration management • database/: Centralized database connectivity and models
The plugin seamlessly integrates into QGIS interface with a dedicated toolbar for efficient workflow management.
